name: @rbxts/http-queue
description: A small library to queue requests for your different external services

scripts.prepublishOnly: cp vendor/Promise/lib/init.lua DependencyLoader/Promise.lua ; mv DependencyLoader/ lib/DependencyLoader/ ; mv README.md tmp.tmp ; mv README-TS.md README.md
scripts.postpublish: mv lib/DependencyLoader/ DependencyLoader/ ; rm DependencyLoader/Promise.lua ; mv README.md README-TS.md ; mv tmp.tmp README.md
